pages.text: The $(#b38cff)Enchanted Crystal$() is a fundamental component in many advanced alchemy recipes. It combines the dimensional properties of ender pearls with the crystalline structure of amethyst, infused with concentrated mana.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: Craft in the $(#b38cff)Alchemy Table$() using an Amethyst Shard, Alchemical Catalyst (with 10,000 stored mana), and an Ender Pearl.

pages.title: Uses
pages.text: $(l)Recipe Ingredient For:$()$(br)• Grand Shulker Box Inception$(br)• Advanced enchantments$(br)• High-tier equipment$(br)• Dimensional items$(br2)$(4)Tip:$() Always keep a few Enchanted Crystals in stock - they're required for many end-game recipes!
